SELECT a.or_id , MAX(a.MP_MFNO) AS mp_mfno , MAX(a.MP_PROD_NAME) AS mp_prod_name , MAX(a.MP_QTY) AS mp_qty , MAX(a.MP_PR_STATE) AS mp_pr_state , ISNULL(( SELECT TOP 1 mfs_state FROM sm_mf_process_stop WHERE OR_ID = a.OR_ID ORDER BY mfs_idx DESC ),0) AS mfs_state , MAX(b.mfs_idx) AS mfs_idx , MAX(c.MFL_MANAGER) AS mfl_manager FROM sm_mf_proc a LEFT JOIN sm_mf_process_stop b ON a.OR_ID = b.OR_ID LEFT JOIN sm_mf_proc_log c ON a.or_id = c.or_id WHERE 1=1
AND a.mp_pr_state = 1
AND ISNULL(( SELECT TOP 1 mfs_state FROM sm_mf_process_stop WHERE OR_ID = a.OR_ID ORDER BY mfs_idx DESC ),0) IN (2,0)
AND ISNULL(( SELECT TOP 1 mfs_state FROM sm_mf_process_stop WHERE OR_ID = a.OR_ID ORDER BY mfs_idx DESC ),0) IN (1)
AND a.mp_pr_state IN (0,1)
AND a.or_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY a.or_id ORDER BY or_id DESC OFFSET #{firstIndex} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS ONLY
